Milestones is a large high specification residence completed in 2009. Positioned on the edge of Keston Park close to Locksbottom Village. Offering extensive accommodation approaching 11,000 sq ft. The property boasts a wealth of quality, beautifully fitted with oak joinery, Lutron lighting and an impressive galleried hall/landing with bespoke oak staircase and marble floors. The spacious accommodation includes five reception rooms with bespoke fitted furniture in the study and kitchen by Chambers Furniture. The property has been finished in a contemporary traditional style with feature fireplaces, underfloor heating and oak framed double glazed windows. Upstairs there are seven bedroom suites over two floors, the master suite taking one wing of the house. In addition there is a triple detached garage block with staff annexe over. The property sits central on its one acre plot with a large gated gravel driveway and access to south easterly facing gardens to rear with a large terrace. Built and designed by the current owners Foxgrove built in 2014 offers accommodation approaching 10,000 sq ft. With an equally large specification.An impressive marble floored entrance hall features a bespoke oak turned staircase double height with skylight and access to all the principle reception rooms. These include a drawing room, dining room and comprehensively fitted study with furniture by Chambers in Oak and burr oak.The family room merges into the contemporary state of the art Chambers fitted kitchen with Gaggenau appliances and a neat concealed access to a separate utility room.An amazing games room/entertainment room with bar and trophy cabinet provides excellent aspects through a floor to ceiling glass wall over the indoor pool, which has a spa and steam room alongside the usual shower and changing facilities.Six bedroom suites occupy the first and second floors, all fully fitted with quality sanitaryware and fitted furniture.The attractive elevations include quality double gazed sash windows providing that traditional much sought after look.With underfloor heating, technology and mood lighting this bright and spacious residence sits on a plot of half an acre within this popular gated estate.Keston Park itself sits on the edge of green belt countryside. A very well presented five bedroom house set in a gated position just outside Keston Village offering spacious family accommodation with three reception rooms, a large open plan fitted kitchen with conservatory and attached swimming pool to side.With double garage secluded gardens and access to greenbelt countryside, this is a rare a family home that is within the catchment area for the popular Keston Village Primary school. A viewing is recommended.

Ravensbourne is an historic Manor House positioned alongside Keston Ponds, in extensive private grounds.The house and grounds have been thoughtfully transformed into seven luxury manor apartments and four townhouses.The apartments and houses all feature wonderful private outdoor terraces and garden space as well as dedicated underground parking, with over 14,000 sq ft. Of private amenity for the owners in addition to nearly 3 acres of gardens. Being designed with the utmost care, the apartments benefit from a superb specification such as bespoke kitchens with marble work surfaces, bespoke bathrooms and en suites and underfloor heating throughout.The development benefits from a secure "Club Room", containing a boot room, dog wash facility and storage. Visitor car spaces are situated towards the front of the grounds. Security has been well considered with CCTV, Video entry and number plate recognition system to the front gate.Locally, the area is extremely popular offering a 17 minute train journey to London Victoria from Bromley South. With Hayes and Orpington stations only a few miles away, fast trains are available to Cannon Street, Charing Cross as well as Victoria. The Keston Ponds location is highly sought after, being surrounded by quiet, tree lined roads, large detached properties and the private gated estates of Keston Park and Farnborough Park. The village of Keston boasts a post office, several village shops and three popular pubs. Keston Common is popular for dog walking and the surrounding area benefits from several golf courses. Several popular schools are situated in the wider local area.

Modernised and updated to an extremely high standard is this stunning five bedroom detached residence situated in Hayes' most desirable private roads, surrounded by peaceful woodland. The accommodation comprises of a spacious entrance hall with feature glazed staircase and both family room and lounge with bi-folding doors bringing the stunning garden and decking area seamlessly into the property. There is a well appointed kitchen with numerous integrated appliances, solid work surfaces and central island opening directly onto the dining room with roof lantern proving excellent natural light and bi-folding across the full width of the room. The ground floor also features a study/office, utility room and downstairs cloakroom. The integral garage can also be accessed from the utility room. The first floor begins from the galleried landing with matching glazed balustrade, which leads to the bedrooms. The master bedroom provides a stunning vista over the rear garden from the bi-folding doors and Juliet balcony and features an en-suite bathroom and an ample range of fitted wardrobes. Bedrooms two and three are en-suite to a luxury Jack and Jill bathroom. There are two further bedrooms and a further luxury family bathroom. The rear garden is a particular feature of the plot being laid to lawn and stocked with a lovely mix of mature trees and shrubs, not overlooked from the rear and having a substantial deck patio area. To the front there is a horseshoe driveway with parking for numerous vehicles and an additional garden area opposite leading into the woodland and a feature of the road. Hayes Station (London zone 5) is within 0.7 miles offering direct services into London Bridge, Charing Cross and Cannon Street. Ravensbourne is an historic Manor House positioned alongside Keston Ponds, in extensive private grounds.The house and grounds have been thoughtfully transformed into seven luxury manor apartments and four townhouses.The apartments and houses all feature wonderful private outdoor terraces and garden space as well as dedicated underground parking, with over 14,000 sq ft of private amenity for the owners in addition to nearly 3 acres of gardens. Being designed with the utmost care, the apartments benefit from a superb specification such as bespoke kitchens with marble work surfaces, bespoke bathrooms and ensuites and underfloor heating throughout.The development benefits from a secure "Club Room", containing a boot room, dog wash facility and storage. Visitor car spaces are situated towards the front of the grounds. Security has been well considered with CCTV, Video entry and number plate recognition system to the front gate.Locally, the area is extremely popular offering a 17 minute train journey to London Victoria from Bromley South. With Hayes and Orpington stations only a few miles away, fast trains are available to Cannon Street, Charing Cross as well as Victoria. The Keston Ponds location is highly sought after, being surrounded by quiet, tree lined roads, large detached properties and the private gated estates of Keston Park and Farnborough Park. The village of Keston boasts a post office, several village shops and three popular pubs. Keston Common is popular for dog walking and the surrounding area benefits from several golf courses. Several poipular schools are situated in the wider local area.
